qustion: Your friend brought the incorrect set of Pokemon cards to school to play during lunch break.

Reaction.text: Damn it! I asked you to bring the ones for action heroes! You’re so stupid!
It’s fine. I really don’t mind. We can play with these cards today.Hey! It’s alright! I think you must have been really busy at home !
Let’s play these ones today and you can bring the correct ones next time! Do you want me to remind you if that’s helpful?

qustion: You placed milk in the incorrect drawer.

Reaction.text: What is wrong with you?! How many times do I have to tell you where to put the milk?!
It’s alright. Here’s the drawer. I will remind you until you remember. And when you do, you get a comic book of your choice, okay?
